attributes.action: Business Start up with mental health problems
attributes.additional_details:
i want to start getting more help for people that have a mental health disability, I currently suffer with depression and thought that it was the end when i got i but with the help of people around, I started my own business. I am currently crowdfunding to expand https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/cleaning-supplies/x/7489143 donations welcome.

But i believe that theres not enough help for people with mental health problems to start a business or get back in employement. Its easy for the government to say something but different when they do something.

I never got one bit of help off the government and im sick of people that think depression is a diease it can be managed and we are still the same as everyone else, Help people that had mental health problems to move forward
